title: OPEC+ July Oil Output Was Lower Than 411,000 Bpd Planned Hike
summary: The OPEC+ producers raised their combined crude oil production by 335,000 barrels per day (bpd) in July, below the 411,000 bpd output hike eight of the 22 producers have pledged for last month. OPEC-only production from the 12-member cartel increased by 263,000 bpd—and most of...
fullContent: The OPEC+ producers raised their combined crude oil production by 335,000 barrels per day (bpd) in July, below the 411,000 bpd output hike eight of the 22 producers have pledged for last month. OPEC-only production from the 12-member cartel increased by 263,000 bpd—and most of the rise came from two major producers, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates (UAE), according to data from secondary sources in OPEC’s Monthly Oil Market Report published on Tuesday. Saudi Arabia accounted for half of the OPEC+ production hike…

title: Gayatri Highways Limited
summary: Gayatri Highways Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Appointment of appointment Secretarial Auditor as Other of the company w.e.f. April 01, 2025.Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations,...
fullContent: Gayatri Highways Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Appointment of appointment Secretarial Auditor as Other of the company w.e.f. April 01, 2025.Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that based on the recommendation of the Audit Committee; the Board of Directors of the Company at its Board Meeting held today, the 12th day of August, 2025 has approved:1. The appointment of M/s. V. Shankar & Co., Company Secretaries as a Secretarial Auditor of the Company for a term of 5 years with effect from 01st April, 2025, subject to approval of the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting of the Company. |SUBJECT: Appointment

title: The Spanish Left Is Testing Europe’s Democratic Nerve
summary: Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez's conduct increasingly suggests that he is fixated on retaining power at any cost, even if that means eroding democratic norms and institutions. Because Europeans are so used to seeing such behavior from the right, they have been slow to...
fullContent: Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez's conduct increasingly suggests that he is fixated on retaining power at any cost, even if that means eroding democratic norms and institutions. Because Europeans are so used to seeing such behavior from the right, they have been slow to recognize a comparable threat on the left.

title: My Book "The Origins of Efficiency" is Now Available for Preorder
summary: I’m happy to announce that my book, The Origins of Efficiency, is now (officially) available for preorder, and will be released on September 23rd. You can preorder on Amazon, Stripe, Barnes and Noble, or Bookshop.com.
fullContent: I’m happy to announce that my book, The Origins of Efficiency, is now (officially) available for preorder, and will be released on September 23rd. You can preorder on Amazon, Stripe, Barnes and Noble, or Bookshop.com.
